content: Could other @T-lang folks take a look at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79850 and offer a second opinion? I don't want to be the only person weighing in on that one. I wrote a comment at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79850#issuecomment-813098366 summarizing my view.
/me needs a todo list in zulip itself
